item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

Try replacing your compiler with:

[code]@echo off
COLOR F4
cls
:menu
title Khasck’s Compiler
echo :------------------------------------------------:
echo :------------------------------------------------:
echo :------------------------------------------------:
echo :-------------Khasck-Perfect-Compiler------------:
echo :------------------------------------------------:
echo :------------------------------------------------:
echo :------------------------------------------------:
echo.
echo Remember To Always Create A Back-Up Of Any Edited Files!
echo.
echo C - To Compile Your Server (To Update Any Changes)
echo R - To Run Your Server (To Start Your Server Up)
echo S - To Run Silabs Client (Must Have Client.jar File)
echo M - To Go Create Your Own Command!
echo E - To Exit This Program (To Leave This Window)
echo.
echo.
set /p compile=Option:
if %compile%==c goto compile
if %compile%==C goto compile
if %compile%==r goto run
if %compile%==R goto run
if %compile%==S goto silab
if %compile%==s goto silab
if %compile%==M goto command
if %compile%==m goto command
if %compile%==e goto end
if %compile%==E goto end
if %compile%==* goto error
goto error
:compile
cls
title Khasck Compiler
goto checkjavac
:compile2
if exist src (goto compile5) else (goto compile3)
:compile3
if exist .java (goto compile4) else (goto compileerror)
:compile4
%javac% -cp . .java
pause
cls
goto menu
:compile5
%javac% -cp . .\src*.java
pause
move .\src*.class .\classes
cls
goto menu
:compileerror
cls
echo You need to have Java files for this compiler to compile.
pause
cls
goto menu
:run
cls
title Khasck
goto checkjava
:run2
set runjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
cls
goto run3
:run3
if exist .\classes\server.class (goto run6) else (goto run4)
:run4
if exist .\server.class (goto run5) else (goto servererror)
:run5
%runjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:run6
set runjava=
set runjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server
%runjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:silab
JAVA -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmem members 0
pause
goto menu
:command
@echo off
COLOR F4
:index
set voi=commands.txt
set dir=.
if exist .\sources set dir=.\sources
if exist .\Sources set dir=.\Sources
set code=
set code1=
set code2=
set code3=
set code4=
set code5=
set code6=
set code7=
set code8=
set code9=
set code10=
cls
title Khasck Command Maker
echo.
echo Command maker by Khasck
echo.
echo How to use:
echo.
echo 1.) Type S To Start Making Your Command.
echo 2.) Type In A Name For Your Command.
echo 3.) Select Your Command Type.
echo 4.) Select What You Would Like Your Command To Do.
echo 5.) Copy Your New Code From The New Commands File.
echo 6.) Paste The Code Into Your Client.Jar Command List
echo 7.) Compile Your Server, And Run!
echo.
echo.
echo S - To Begin Making A Command.
echo E - To Leave This Window.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt=Option:
if %opt%==s goto step1a
if %opt%==S goto step1a
if %opt%==start goto step1a
if %opt%==e goto end
if %opt%==E goto end
if %opt%==exit goto end
if %opt%== goto er
goto er
:er
title Khasck Command Maker
cls
echo Unrecognized command.
echo Make sure You Are Fucking Spelling,
echo The Fucking Commands Fucking Correctly, Noob…
pause
goto index
:er2
title Khasck Command Maker
cls
echo You Don’t Have commands.txt.
echo Would you like To Create That File Now?
echo.
echo.
set /p yn=(Y/N)?
if %yn%==y goto y
if %yn%==Y goto y
if %yn%==yes goto y
if %yn%==Yes goto y
if %yn%==YES goto y
if %yn%==n goto n
if %yn%==N goto n
if %yn%==no goto n
if %yn%==No goto n
if %yn%==NO goto n
if %yn%== goto er
goto er
:y
echo //made by command maker >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
echo import java.io.; >> %dir%%voi%
echo import java.util.StringTokenizer; >> %dir%%voi%
echo import java.util.Calendar; >> %dir%commands.txt
echo import java.util.GregorianCalendar; >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1
:n
cls
echo You Can Not Continue Making This Command,
echo Until You Have Created A commands.txt File.
pause
goto intro
:end
cls
exit
:step1
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Step 1
if not exist %dir%%voi% (goto er2) else (goto step1a)
if not exist %dir%%voi% (goto er2) else (goto step1a)
if not exist %dir%%voi% (goto er2) else (goto step1a)
:step1a
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Step 2
set /p name=What Do You Want The Name Of The Command To Be?
:step1b
echo Now Select What You Would Like The Command To Do
echo a - Teleport, Add A Item Or Items and Send A Message
echo 1 - Teleport And Add A Item Or Items
echo 2 - Add A Item Or Items and Send A Message
echo 3 - Teleport And Send A Message
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==a goto step1g
if %opt3%==A goto step1g
if %opt3%==all goto step1g
if %opt3%==1 goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==sel1 goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==SEL1 goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==2 goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==sel2 goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==SEL2 goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==3 goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==sel3 goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==SEL3 goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%== goto er
:stepsel1
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Step 3
echo Now Add The Features, Starting With The Teleport.
echo I - (Second) Adds A Item Or Items To Your Command
echo T - (First) Adds A Teleport To Rour Command
echo F - Finalizes The Command
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==F goto step1e
if %opt3%==finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==item goto stepsel1x
if %opt3%==I goto stepsel1x
if %opt3%==i goto stepsel1x
if %opt3%==tele goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==T goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==t goto stepsel1g
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepsel2
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Step 3
echo Now Add The Features, Starting With Adding A Item.
echo M - (Second) Adds A Message To Your Command
echo I - (First) Adds A Item Or Items To Your Command
echo F - Finalizes The Command
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==m goto stepsel2d
if %opt3%==Message goto stepsel2d
if %opt3%==MESSAGE goto stepsel2d
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==Finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==FINISH goto step1e
if %opt3%==i goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==Item goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==ITEM goto stepsel2x
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepall
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Step 3
echo Now Add The Features, starting with The Teleport.
echo M - (Third) Adds A Message To Your command
echo I - (Second) Adds A Item Or Items To Your Command
echo T - (First) Adds A Teleport To Your Command
echo F - Finalizes The Command.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==m goto step1d
if %opt3%==Message goto step1d
if %opt3%==MESSAGE goto step1d
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==Finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==FINISH goto step1e
if %opt3%==i goto step1x
if %opt3%==Item goto step1x
if %opt3%==ITEM goto step1x
if %opt3%==t goto step1g
if %opt3%==Tele goto step1g
if %opt3%==TELE goto step1g
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepsel3
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Step 3
echo Now Add The Features, starting with The Teleport.
echo M - (Second) Adds A Message To Your command
echo T - (First) Adds A Teleport To Your Command
echo F - Finalizes the command.
echo.
echo.
set /p opt3=Option:
if %opt3%==m goto stepsel3d
if %opt3%==Message goto stepsel3d
if %opt3%==MESSAGE goto stepsel3d
if %opt3%==f goto step1e
if %opt3%==Finish goto step1e
if %opt3%==FINISH goto step1e
if %opt3%==t goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==Tele goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==TELE goto stepsel3g
if %opt3%==* goto er
goto er
:stepsel1x
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=What Item Number & How Many Do You Want? eg: 995, 100 For 100 Gp
set item=addItem(%mess%);
goto stepsel1f
:step1x
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=What Item Number & How Many Do You Want? eg: 995, 100 For 100 Gp
set item=addItem(%mess%);
goto step1d

:stepsel2x
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=What Item Number & How Many Do You Want? eg: 995, 100 For 100 Gp
set item=addItem(%mess%);
goto stepsel2d

:stepsel2d
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=What Do You Want The Message To Be?
set code=sendMessage("%mess%");
goto stepsel2f
:step1d
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=What Do You Want The Message To Be?
set code=sendMessage("%mess%");
goto step1f
:step1g
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=Teleport C Coord:
set telex=teleportToX = %mess%;
goto step1z
:step1z
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=Teleport Y Coord:
set teley=teleportToY = %mess%;
goto step1x
:stepsel3d
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=What Do You Want The Message To Be?
set code=sendMessage("%mess%");
goto stepsel3f
:stepsel3g
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=Teleport X Coord:
set telex=teleportToX = %mess%;
goto stepsel3z
:stepsel3z
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=Teleport Y Coord:
set teley=teleportToY = %mess%;
goto stepsel3d
:stepsel1g
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=Teleport X Coord:
set telex=teleportToX = %mess%;
goto stepsel1z
:stepsel1z
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Step 5
set /p mess=Teleport Y Coord:
set teley=teleportToY = %mess%;
goto stepsel1x
:step1f
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Finished
echo Generating The command And Adding It To Your Commands.txt File…
pause
cls
if not defined code goto step1fa
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %code% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:stepsel3f
cls
title Khasck Command maker - Finished
echo Generating The command And Adding It To Your Commands.txt File…
pause
cls
if not defined code goto step1fa
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %code% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:stepsel2f
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Finished
echo Generating The command And Adding It To Your Commands.txt File…
pause
cls
if not defined code goto step1fa
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %code% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:stepsel1f
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Finished
echo Generating The command And Adding It To Your Commands.txt File…
pause
cls
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo %item% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %telex% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo %teley% >> %dir%%voi% >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g
:step1fa
if %nummess% GEQ 2 goto step1fb
echo if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("%name%")) >> %dir%%voi%
echo { >> %dir%%voi%
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
goto step1g

:step1fc
echo } >> %dir%%voi%
echo. >> %dir%%voi%
:step1g
cls
title Khasck Command Maker - Finished
echo The Command Has Been Created And Has Been Added To Your Commands.txt
echo And Has Been Added To Your Commands.txt successfully!
echo Where would you like to go now?
echo.
echo I - Takes you to the Index page
echo E - Exits Out Of This Command Maker
echo.
echo.
set /p opt5=Option:
if %opt5%==i goto index
if %opt5%==Index goto index
if %opt5%==INDEX goto index
if %opt5%==e goto end
if %opt5%==Exit goto end
if %opt5%==EXIT goto end
if %opt5%==* goto er
goto er
goto menu
:servererror
cls
title Error
echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the
echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try running it.
pause
cls
goto menu
:error
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type
echo in are correct.
pause
cls
goto menu
:end
cls
exit
:checkjavac
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac) else (goto checkjavac2)
:checkjavac2
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac2) else (goto checkjavac3)
:checkjavac3
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac3) else (goto checkjavac4)
:checkjavac4
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac4) else (goto checkjavac5)
:checkjavac5
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac5) else (goto checkjavac6)
:checkjavac6
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac6) else (goto checkjavac7)
:checkjavac7
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac7) else (goto checkjavac8)
:checkjavac8
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_01\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac8) else (goto checkjavac9)
:checkjavac9
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_02\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac9) else (goto checkjavac10)
:checkjavac10
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_03\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac10) else (goto checkjavac11)
:checkjavac11
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_04\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac11) else (goto checkjavac12)
:checkjavac12
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac12) else (goto javacerror)
:setjavac
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac2
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac3
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac4
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac5
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac6
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac7
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac8
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_01\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac9
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_02\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac10
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_03\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac11
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_04\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac12
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:javacerror
cls
title Error
echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok’s tutorial
echo on the Moparscape Tutorials section for a direct link to download
echo the newest JDK Update.
pause
cls
goto menu
:checkjava
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava) else (goto checkjava2)
:checkjava2
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava2) else (goto checkjava3)
:checkjava3
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava3) else (goto checkjava4)
:checkjava4
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava4) else (goto checkjava5)
:checkjava5
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava5) else (goto checkjava6)
:checkjava6
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava6) else (goto checkjava7)
:checkjava7
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava7) else (goto checkjava8)
:checkjava8
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_01\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava8) else (goto checkjava9)
:checkjava9
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_02\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava9) else (goto checkjava10)
:checkjava10
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_03\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava10) else (goto checkjava11)
:checkjava11
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_04\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava11) else (goto checkjava12)
:checkjava12
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\java.exe” (goto setjava12) else (goto javaerror)
:setjava
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava2
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava3
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava4
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava5
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava6
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava7
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava8
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_01\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava9
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_02\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava10
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_03\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava11
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_04\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:setjava12
set java="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_05\bin\java.exe"
goto run2
:javaerror
cls
title Error
echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok’s tutorial
echo on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for a direct link to download
echo the newest JDK Update.
pause
cls
goto menu[/code]
